attributes.action: require members of parliament to wear fancy dress once a month during Prime Minister's questions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At Prime Minister's questions, once a month, MPs must wear fancy dress, or at least casual clothing. They will be forced to pay a pound to do this (just like most offices in the UK), and all money raised will go to various charities.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
